title: Welcome to the LETUDash App!
content: The app will display a list of feed items. You can select the desired item that you want to add to your dashboard by tapping on it. After selecting the item, the app will update your dashboard to show the added item. The app saves your preferences after each action. You do not need to worry about losing any changes that you make to your dashboard. Congratulations! You now know how to use LETUDash App to add more information to your dashboard. If you have any questions or issues, please refer to the app's FAQs or contact our customer support team for assistance.
